task.title: Maintaining the Steering Apparatus
task.shortdesc: The steering apparatus requires minimal maintenance beyond regular lubrication of the post gears.

context.p: The steering mechanism uses "sun and planet" post gears located at the top of the post below the wheel hub. Regular inspection and lubrication will ensure proper operation.

steps.stepsection: To inspect and lubricate the post gears:

substep.cmd: Unscrew the nut on top of the post
Place a block of wood against the wheel
Use a hammer to carefully drive the wheel off the shaft

result.p: The steering apparatus will maintain smooth operation with proper lubrication.
